title: Two for the Price of One
description: Alexandria Eastland never thought to find herself divorced.Two years later, she’s tired of mourning her loss and being alone. It’s time to move on, to live again. Only she has no idea that decision will change her life in more ways than one.Jared Kingston and Kai Stone have everything they could possibly want in their relationship. Except a woman to share it with. When Jared and Kai meet Alexandria at the local fetish club, they know they have found their third.Alexandria, isn’t so sure.Getting her heart broken by one man was hard enough, two would be devastating.But Jared and Kai won’t give up, they know that Alexandria is the one.
author: Kimberly Hunter
